# WKAlertActionStyle.destructive

**Case**

An action that causes destructive behavior to the user’s data or the app. Destructive actions are styled in a way that warns the user of the destructive nature of the action.

## Declaration

```swift
case destructive
```

## Constants

- **WKAlertActionStyle.default**: The default style. Use this for most of your buttons.
- **WKAlertActionStyle.cancel**: A cancel action. Use this style for an action that cancels the operation without making changes.
